name: custom-error-service
description: Error Service for handling HTTP Errors
author: Isidro A. Lopez G. <me@ialopezg.com>

scripts.build: npm run clean && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version && tsc --pretty
scripts.copy: copyfiles -u 1 "dist/lib/**/*" dist/package && copyfiles package.json LICENSE README.md CHANGELOG.MD dist/package
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run public && rimraf dist/lib
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp
